name: Dragonchess
author: DM Brad
short: Play the dice game Threes (aka Dragonchess)
description: A two-player dice game where players roll 5 dice, keeping at least one per roll, aiming for the lowest score. 3s count as zero. Rolling 6-6-6-6-6 is an instant win (Shooting the Moon).
install_msg: Thanks for installing Dragonchess! Use `[p]dragonchess` or `[p]dc` to start a game.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores win/loss statistics per user within each guild.
